node.title: 'There was no hoax': Empire actor rejects claims he planned attack on himself
node.alt: A sketch of a man with short dark hair and a closely shaven beard sits in a dock with jurors impaneled in the background
node.description: Empire actor Jussie Smollett denies he staged a homophobic, racist attack on himself in 2019 in response to inaction by the show's producers over hate mail he received.
node.content:
["Former Empire actor Jussie Smollett has denied he staged a homophobic and\u00a0racist attack on himself, testifying that \"there was no hoax\" during his trial and that he was the victim of a hate crime in Chicago.\u00a0", "Mr Smollett, who is facing charges of lying to Chicago police about the attack in January 2019, refuted damaging testimony from two brothers,\u00a0Abimbola and Olabingo Osundairo, last week.", "Both men testified that Mr Smollett, who is black and gay, orchestrated the hoax to get publicity and paid them $US100 ($141) for supplies while instructing them to place a noose around his neck and yell homophobic slurs.\u00a0", "They also said Mr Smollett gave them a $US3,500 ($4,940) cheque to carry out the attack.\u00a0", "Mr Smollett appeared calm over several hours of testimony and said he wrote the cheque to Abimbola Osundairo for nutrition and training advice.", "When asked by his defence lawyer if he gave Mr Osundairo payment for some kind of hoax, Mr Smollett said \"never.\"", "When probed by lawyer Nenye Uche, Mr Smollet replied:\u00a0\"No, there was no hoax.\"\u00a0", "Asked if he paid Mr Osundairo and his brother $US100 to buy supplies to carry out the fake attack, he replied, \"Absolutely not\".", "Mr Smollett told the court he had just returned from a trip and was walking home after buying a sandwich at around 2:00am on January 29, 2019, when a person yelled a racist, homophobic remark.", "Mr Smollett said he turned around to confront the person, who he said towered over him.", "", "
Mr Smollett could be jailed for up to three years if found guilty.(AP: Charles Rex Arbogast)
", "
'I do not trust the police'
", "Standing up in the Chicago courtroom, Mr Smollett demonstrated how he said the man walked quickly toward him and pointed to his left temple to show where the man hit him.", "\"I would like to think I landed a punch. But I don't know if it landed,\" Mr Smollett said.", "He said the man slipped and the pair tussled on the ground for up to 30 seconds.", "He said he saw a second person \u2014 who he believes kicked him in his side \u2014 as the first man ran away.", "Mr Smollett said he assumed the person who first attacked him was white because he used a racial slur and shouted \"MAGA country\",\u00a0an apparent reference to former US president Donald Trump's campaign.\u00a0", "The\u00a0Osundairo brothers, who are black, testified last week that Mr Smollett instructed them to yell\u00a0\"this is MAGA country\" during the fake assault.", "Mr Smollett said he picked up his phone and told the person he had been talking to that he \"got jumped\".", "He said he noticed a noose around his neck as he returned to his apartment and removed it, but a friend in his apartment called police and told him to put the noose back on so officers could see it.", "Mr Smollett said he was upset police had been called because he would never have done so.", "\"I am a black man in America. I do not trust the police,\" Mr Smollett said.", "Mr Smollett said he \"lost his livelihood\" after news broke of the attack.\u00a0", "
Actor refused to hand over phone
", "Under cross-examination, Mr Smollett said he refused to give Chicago police his phone for their investigation because he wanted his privacy respected.\u00a0", "Asked by special prosecutor Dan Webb if he was concerned the phone would show several calls to Abimbola Osundairo, Mr Smollett said: \"No.\"", "Mr Smollett also testified that Mr Osundairo told him he could buy a herbal steroid that encourages weight loss but is illegal in the US\u00a0while on\u00a0an upcoming trip to Nigeria.", "Mr Osundairo testified that Mr Smollett sent him a text message about talking \"on the low\"\u00a0and that during the conversation Mr Smollett asked him to help stage the attack.", "Mr Smollett said the message was in reference to the illegal steroid.", "When Mr Smollett was asked by Mr Webb about claims he was recruited for a hoax, the actor replied: \"Fully false, 100 per cent false.\"", "", "
Mr Smollett arrived at the\u00a0Leighton Criminal Courthouse in Chicago to defend accusations he staged a hate crime.(AP: Matt Marton)
", "Defence lawyers\u00a0suggested the Osundairo brothers accused Mr Smollett of staging the hoax because they disliked him and saw an opportunity to make money.", "They argued the brothers asked Mr Smollett for $US2 million to not testify against him at trial\u00a0after they were questioned by police about the attack.\u00a0", "Mr Smollett's lawyers also argued Chicago police rushed to judgement when they laid charges against their client.\u00a0", "Mr Smollett said he met Abimbola Osundairo in 2017 at a club, where he learned the man had also worked on the Empire set.", "He said the two men did drugs together and went to a bathhouse, where Mr Smollett said they \"made out\".", "He said the two men later did more drugs and participated in sex acts together.", "Mr Osundairo testified last week that he and Mr Smollett did not have a sexual relationship.", "
Attack staged over on-set issues, lawyers say
", "", "
Mr Smollett's lawyers argued Chicago police rushed to judgement when they laid charges against him.(AP: Paul Beaty)
", "Prosecutors said Mr\u00a0Smollett staged the attack because he was unhappy with the Empire studio's response to hate mail he received.", "The letter included a drawing of a stick figure hanging by a noose\u00a0with a gun pointed at it\u00a0and the word \"MAGA\".", "Empire\u00a0producer\u00a0Brett Mahoney testified that law enforcement was contacted and the letter turned over to authorities.", "He said Mr Smollett agreed to added security on set, but did not want anyone following him home because it was too intrusive.", "Mr Smollett testified that he thought the studio was doing or suggesting too much security, like wanting someone to drive him to and from the set.", "He said Abimbola Osundairo joked about becoming his security, but that he did not take it seriously.", "Mr Smollett, 39, is charged with six counts of felony disorderly conduct for allegedly making a false police report about the alleged attack.", "It includes\u00a0one count for each time he gave a report\u00a0to three different officers.", "The crime carries a prison sentence of up to three years in jail, but experts said if Mr Smollett was convicted, he would\u00a0likely be placed on probation and ordered to complete community service.", "AP"]
